description: React component for the dashboard page displaying connection management UI, including listing connectors, validating, revoking, and linking to external documentation.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches connector data from the API and updates state accordingly.

methods.name: onValidate
methods.description: Validates a specific connector connection by ID.

methods.name: onRevoke
methods.description: Revokes a specific connector connection by ID, with confirmation.
